item.title: Linear Discriminant Analysis
item.description: my Matlab implementation clc; clear all; load('/home/zong/Downloads/dataLDA-1/dataLDA/trainTrain.mat') load('/home/zong/Downloads/dataLDA-1/dataLDA/testLDA.mat') % X and Y here is training data Y = Ytrain; X = Xtrain; [featrue_size, sample] = size(Xtrain); pi_0 = length(find(Y==0))/size(Y,2); pi_1 = length(find(Y==1))/size(Y,2); % mean u_0 = mean(X(:,find(Y==0)),2); u_1 = mean(X(:,find(Y==1)),2); % covariance by my code (psudo, not exactly convariance) covv = ((X(:,find(Y==0)) - u_0)*(X(:,find(Y==0)) - u_0)' + (X(:,find(Y==1)) - u_1)*(X(:,find(Y==1)) - u_1)')/200; a = inv(covv) * (u_0 - u_1); b = -0.
